description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve issues with managed devices related to the firmware:

1. Update the UEFI firmware from the 2023 version to the February 2024 UEFI version.
2. Ensure that the Intel ME Firmware, which includes FTPM, is also updated as part of the process.

**Details**:
Documents indicate that updating these firmware components resolved similar issues across devices, specifically those managed by Dell. Make sure to apply these updates to all relevant devices to ensure they are functioning correctly. (LLM Synthesized)
